div1.p:
I Rec your letter this morning wich maid me laff to think what fools their ar tell the Doc Robson he must eat 2 before he becomes a christan and then he must keep it up fore night and then he must take som bun tea to work it off and then he will be a Doctor of the first order all this is nothing but tell the Doctor if was to crack a samson and then find out what it was he all provibility he would not live twenty fore hours for exsiment would kill him shour their fore you must not tell the Doctor but give him my best complement and tell him we must leave him in the dark at least at the Present keep them all in the dark I will send you plenty of pills and doe the thing that is rite with you treat all my pashents well and you shall mak plenty dont you give 1 of the samson at the riskof your life to any body and dont sho them to any wone I rote you last week and that will keep you tell I send let me hear from you take good kier that they dont steel som of your pills you shall hear from me soune send word how many samson you have
on hand they will keep us from want in this life and your sweet son also but of you doe show them to any boddy I never will forgive you in life I will treat ⁁ you like a Gentleman if I sho them to any boddy in this wourld it shall be you and that is a nuff for you to no— dont send to william for what he owes I will see him in the spring — my daughter is in a low state of helth and that will keep me hear this winter — give my best Respects to Mr Ferguson and all the famley also to Mr Bedford tell him I think I have got home in time to save my chaild and that is more then all the world to me god bles my friends and also my enemies but I no of none and if you hear them spake ill of me draw back and with them and beshoure you keep them down and let them rise no more I am at work for you no news
